recipesJson.name: mlNikon's Berry Parfait
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description:
very good strawberry and blueberry yogurt parfait with sweet granola bits. Don't let this steep for more than a week and a half or else the yogurt will completely take over and drown out the fruits.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H-TJoPVWT0Q&feature=youtu.be
